com.paydiant.android.core.service

Interface ISecurityManagerService

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    SecurityManagerService

    public interface ISecurityManagerService
    The Interface ISecurityManagerService.

    Warning: DO NOT reference the core.service package classes directly as these are missing the required business functionalities. Use core.facade or ui.service classes instead.

    Author:
    Paydiant Inc.

      • retrieveDeviceFingerPrintTemplate

        DeviceFingerprint retrieveDeviceFingerPrintTemplate(DeviceSecurityProfile deviceSecurityProfile,
                                                  Boolean isUsernamePassword)
        The Service Method to retrieve the device finger print.
        Parameters:
        deviceSecurityProfile - - instance of DeviceSecurityProfile
        isUsernamePassword - the is username password
        Returns:
        instance of DeviceFingerprint
        Throws:
        PaydiantException - PaydiantException or an instance of a child PaydiantException class with the following statusCodes

        511(NETWORK_AUTHENTICATION_REQUIRED) - Application Instance Not Verified Error

      • login

        boolean login(DeviceSecurityProfile deviceSecurityProfile,
            Boolean isUsernamePassword)
        This method attempts to login the user with his credentials - Username and Password or PIN If the boolean loginWithUsername is true the username / password is expected for login. If loginWithUsername is false the PIN is expected instead. If login is a success true is returned if not false is returned. Or if any other status code is returned from the server (apart from 401) the PaydiantServerException is thrown. If a error occurs internally within the resttemplate or within the service PaydiantClientException is thrown.
        Parameters:
        deviceSecurityProfile - - The object which encapsulates the user credentials and device information needed to validate a login
        isUsernamePassword - the is username password
        Returns:
        - return boolean value , true for login success false for login failure.

      • logout

        void logout()
        Logout.

        boolean deleteDevice(DeleteDevice device)
        Delete device.
        Parameters:
        device - the device
        Returns:
        true, if successful

      • getDeviceFingerprintTemplateByFederatedIdentity

        DeviceSecurityProfile getDeviceFingerprintTemplateByFederatedIdentity(DeviceSecurityProfile deviceSecurityProfile)
        Gets the device fingerprint template by federated identity.
        Parameters:
        deviceSecurityProfile - the device security profile
        Returns:
        the device fingerprint template by federated identity
        Throws:
        PaydiantException - PaydiantException or an instance of a child PaydiantException class with the following statusCodes

        400(BAD_REQUEST) - Invalid arguments
        500 (INTERNAL_SERVER_ERROR) -Internal server error.
        401(UNAUTHORIZED) - Authentication Failed
        415(UNSUPPORTED_MEDIA_TYPE) - Invalid application signature error
        426(UPGRADE_REQUIRED) - Invalid app SDK version error
        503(SERVICE_UNAVAILABLE) - Device suspended
        421(DESTINATION_LOCKED) - Customer deactivated error
        423(LOCKED) - Device deactivated due to consecutive failed login attempts error
        418(I_AM_A_TEAPOT) - User email unverified error
        511(NETWORK_AUTHENTICATION_REQUIRED) - Application Instance Not Verified Error
        Since:
        5.3.0.1

      • loginByFederatedIdentity

        boolean loginByFederatedIdentity(DeviceSecurityProfile deviceSecurityProfile)
        Login by federated identity.
        Parameters:
        deviceSecurityProfile - the device security profile
        Returns:
        true, if successful
        Throws:
        PaydiantException - PaydiantException or an instance of a child PaydiantException class with the following statusCodes

        401(UNAUTHORIZED) - Authentication Failed
        421(DESTINATION_LOCKED) - Customer deactivated error
        423(LOCKED) - Device deactivated error
        503(SERVICE_UNAVAILABLE) - Device suspended error
        Since:
        5.3.0.1

      • generateDeviceAuthToken

        String generateDeviceAuthToken(UserCredentials userCredentials)
        Generates a device authentication token for long lived sessions. The UserCredentials parameter requires username and password properties populated.
        Parameters:
        userCredentials - - UserCredentials object with username and password properties populated.
        Returns:
        generated device authentication token
        Throws:
        PaydiantException - PaydiantException or an instance of a child PaydiantException class with the following statusCodes
        400(BAD_REQUEST) - Login by device auth token is not supported by issuing partner and application id
        401(UNAUTHORIZED) - Authentication failed
        403(FORBIDDEN) - Not Authenticated
        412(PRECONDITION_FAILED) - Device not registered/not linked
        413(REQUEST_ENTITY_TOO_LARGE) - Device deactivated

        PaydiantEntityReponseException - PaydiantEntityReponseException with the following statusCode, errorInformation.errorCodes
        401(UNAUTHORIZED), 419 - Authentication failed
        400(BAD_REQUEST), 432 - Login by device auth token is not supported by issuing partner and application id
        Since:
        6.1.0.1.a

      • getDeviceFingerprintTemplateByDeviceAuthToken

        DeviceSecurityProfile getDeviceFingerprintTemplateByDeviceAuthToken(DeviceSecurityProfile deviceSecurityProfile)
        Gets the fingerprint template for device authentication token.
        Parameters:
        deviceSecurityProfile - - DeviceSecurityProfile with device authentication token.
        Returns:
        DeviceSecurityProfile for the device authentication token
        Throws:
        PaydiantException - PaydiantException or an instance of a child PaydiantException class with the following statusCodes
        400(BAD_REQUEST) - Login by device auth token is not supported by issuing partner and application id
        401(UNAUTHORIZED) - Authentication failed due to invalid token or exceeding maximum number login attempts. (Use PaydiantEntityReponseException errorInformation.errorCode to identify the exact reason)

        PaydiantEntityReponseException - PaydiantEntityReponseException with the following statusCode, errorInformation.errorCodes
        400(BAD_REQUEST), 432 - Login by device auth token is not supported by issuing partner and application id
        401(UNAUTHORIZED), 419 - Authentication failed due to invalid token
        401(UNAUTHORIZED), 494 - The Mobile Device is deactivated due to exceeding maximum number login attempts.
        Since:
        6.1.0.1.a

      • loginByDeviceAuthToken

        boolean loginByDeviceAuthToken(DeviceSecurityProfile deviceSecurityProfile)
        Logs in using the generated device authentication token fingerprint template.
        Parameters:
        deviceSecurityProfile - - DeviceSecurityProfile object.
        Returns:
        true if successfully logged in.
        Throws:
        PaydiantException - PaydiantException or an instance of a child PaydiantException class with the following statusCodes
        401(UNAUTHORIZED) - Authentication Failed
        421(DESTINATION_LOCKED) - Customer deactivated error
        423(LOCKED) - Device deactivated error

        Since:
        6.1.0.1.a

      • expireDeviceAuthToken

        boolean expireDeviceAuthToken()
        Expires the long lived session device authentication token.
        Returns:
        true if the current device authentication token successfully expired.
        Throws:
        PaydiantException - PaydiantException or an instance of a child PaydiantException class with the following statusCodes
        400(BAD_REQUEST) - Invalid arguments
        412(PRECONDITION_FAILED) - Device not registered/not linked
        413(REQUEST_ENTITY_TOO_LARGE) - Device deactivated
        403(FORBIDDEN) - Not Authenticated

        PaydiantEntityReponseException - PaydiantEntityReponseException with the following statusCode, errorInformation.errorCodes
        400(BAD_REQUEST), 403 - Invalid arguments
        Since:
        6.1.0.1.a
